title: The Latest AI-based Math Solving App
description:
Better than ChatGPT free version.

Not only Mathematics but also English, Physics, and Chemistry.

Support more than 30 languages.
summary: The AI-powered Math10 is a groundbreaking tool that provides efficient and innovative solutions for learning, teaching, and researching mathematics.
capability: Math10 is master in solving only at Maths but also at subjects like English Physics and Chemistry . Unlock your full potential with the power of Math10 !!
features_automated_problem_solving_descr: Instantly identify and solve various types of problems, including algebra, geometry, probability, and calculus.
features_step_by_step_guidance_descripti: Displays detailed solutions, allowing learners to understand the process instead of just receiving the answers.
features_problem_recognition_description: Uses image scanning technology to recognize handwritten or printed math problems, enabling direct problem-solving from textbooks.
features_multi_platform_support_descript: Available on smartphones, tablets, and desktops, offering convenience for all users.
features_target_audience_description:
Students: Improve learning skills and better prepare for exams.
Teachers: Enhance teaching efficiency and provide additional instructional materials.
Researchers: Quickly solve complex problems, supporting projects and scientific research.
features_outstanding_benefits_descriptio:
Saves time and effort in solving math problems.
Enhances self-learning abilities and deepens understanding of mathematical concepts.
Brings mathematics closer to everyone, even non-specialists.
footer_address_description: 4 C11, Đường Đồng Bát, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội
